name: Music_98.wav
keywords: ['slow jazz song', 'barbershop quartet', 'trumpets', 'double bass', 'vocal harmony', 'male voices', 'piano', 'slow tempo', 'romantic song']
caption: This slow jazz song features male voices singing the main melody in harmony. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. The double bass plays the root notes of the chords. Trumpets play a fill in harmony in between lines. A piano plays an arpeggiated chord at the end of the first line. This song has a romantic mood. This song can be played in a classic romantic movie.
